name: Panic or Dash
description:
Panic or Dash

Theme: There are too many bullets

Controls:

Aim with mouse

Dash = mouse click or space

F = Full Screen(download only)


Is a game about dashing through and avoiding bullets while also maintaining your combo to get higher scores.

Hold click to go farther, or click once to go short

 

You can dash though anything purple, or dash into enemies to slay them.

Whenever you dash through a bullet or enemy, time slows down and you can instantly dash again. Use this to your advantage!

Dashing through bullets will reset the meter, while dashing through enemies will make the combo grow larger

Kill enemies, to gain higher scores. Killing enemies with higher combos make your score go up more.

Watch out for red projectiles. You can't dash through them.
